member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryFormat.International

summary.vsli:raw:
A delivery format where non-ASCII characters in the envelope and header fields used in the Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) for mail messages are encoded with UTF-8 characters.
The extensions to support international email are defined in IETF RFC 6530, 6531, and 6532.

member.summary: 一种传递格式，使用 UTF-8 字符对简单邮件传输协议 (SMTP) 中使用的信封和标头字段中的非 ASCII 字符进行编码。 支持国际电子邮件的扩展在 IETF RFC 6530、6531 和 6532 中定义。

member.name: T:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode

summary.vsli:raw: Specifies the outcome of sending email by using the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient" /> class.

member.summary: 使用 类指定发送电子邮件的结果。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.BadCommandSequence

summary.vsli:raw: The commands were sent in the incorrect sequence.

member.summary: 发送命令的顺序不正确。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.CannotVerifyUserWillAttemptDelivery

summary.vsli:raw: The specified user is not local, but the receiving SMTP service accepted the message and attempted to deliver it. This status code is defined in RFC 1123, which is available at https://www.ietf.org.

member.summary: 指定的用户不是本地用户，但接收 SMTP 服务接受了邮件并试图将其传送。 此状态码在 RFC 1123 中定义，可在 https://www.ietf.org 处获取。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.ClientNotPermitted

summary.vsli:raw: The client was not authenticated or is not allowed to send mail using the specified SMTP host.

member.summary: 客户端未经过身份验证或不允许使用指定的 SMTP 主机发送邮件。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.CommandNotImplemented

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service does not implement the specified command.

member.summary: SMTP 服务无法实现指定的命令。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.CommandParameterNotImplemented

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service does not implement the specified command parameter.

member.summary: SMTP 服务无法实现指定的命令参数。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.CommandUnrecognized

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service does not recognize the specified command.

member.summary: SMTP 服务无法识别指定的命令。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.ExceededStorageAllocation

summary.vsli:raw: The message is too large to be stored in the destination mailbox.

member.summary: 消息太大，无法存储在目标邮箱中。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.GeneralFailure

summary.vsli:raw: The transaction could not occur. You receive this error when the specified SMTP host cannot be found.

member.summary: 事务无法发生。 找不到指定的 SMTP 主机时，会收到此错误提示信息。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.HelpMessage

summary.vsli:raw: A Help message was returned by the service.

member.summary: 服务返回的帮助消息。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.InsufficientStorage

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service does not have sufficient storage to complete the request.

member.summary: SMTP 服务没有足够的存储空间来完成该请求。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.LocalErrorInProcessing

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service cannot complete the request. This error can occur if the client's IP address cannot be resolved (that is, a reverse lookup failed). You can also receive this error if the client domain has been identified as an open relay or source for unsolicited email (spam). For details, see RFC 2505, which is available at https://www.ietf.org.

member.summary: SMTP 服务无法完成请求。 如果无法解析客户端的 IP 地址（即反向查找失败），则可能出现此错误。 如果客户端域已被标识为未经请求的电子邮件（垃圾邮件）的开放中继或开放源，也可能会收到此错误提示信息。 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2505，可在 https://www.ietf.org 处获取。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.MailboxBusy

summary.vsli:raw: The destination mailbox is in use.

member.summary: 目标邮箱正在使用中。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.MailboxNameNotAllowed

summary.vsli:raw: The syntax used to specify the destination mailbox is incorrect.

member.summary: 用于指定目标邮箱的语法不正确。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.MailboxUnavailable

summary.vsli:raw: The destination mailbox was not found or could not be accessed.

member.summary: 目标邮箱找不到或无法访问。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.MustIssueStartTlsFirst

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP server is configured to accept only TLS connections, and the SMTP client is attempting to connect by using a non-TLS connection. The solution is for the user to set EnableSsl=true on the SMTP Client.

member.summary: SMTP 服务器配置为仅接受 TLS 连接，并且 SMTP 客户端正在尝试使用非 TLS 连接进行连接。 解决方案是让用户在 SMTP 客户端上设置 EnableSsl = true。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.Ok

summary.vsli:raw: The email was successfully sent to the SMTP service.

member.summary: 电子邮件已成功发送至 SMTP 服务。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.ServiceClosingTransmissionChannel

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service is closing the transmission channel.

member.summary: SMTP 服务正在关闭传输通道。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.ServiceNotAvailable

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service is not available; the server is closing the transmission channel.

member.summary: SMTP 服务不可用；服务器正在关闭传输通道。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.ServiceReady

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service is ready.

member.summary: SMTP 服务已准备就绪。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.StartMailInput

summary.vsli:raw: The SMTP service is ready to receive the email content.

member.summary: SMTP 服务已准备好接收电子邮件内容。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.SyntaxError

summary.vsli:raw: The syntax used to specify a command or parameter is incorrect.

member.summary: 用于指定命令或参数的语法不正确。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.SystemStatus

summary.vsli:raw: A system status or system Help reply.

member.summary: 系统状态或系统帮助回复。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.TransactionFailed

summary.vsli:raw: The transaction failed.

member.summary: 事务失败。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.UserNotLocalTryAlternatePath

summary.vsli:raw: The user mailbox is not located on the receiving server. You should resend using the supplied address information.

member.summary: 用户邮箱不位于接收服务器上。 应使用提供的地址信息重新发送。

member.name: F:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.UserNotLocalWillForward

summary.vsli:raw: The user mailbox is not located on the receiving server; the server forwards the email.

member.summary: 用户邮箱不在接收服务器上；服务器会转发该电子邮件。
